Value.label: Automatic turning off IR external relay output after set time
Value.Help: 0 - Auto OFF disabled. 1 second to 32536 seconds Auto OFF enabled with defined time, step is 1 second. Default value 0.

Value.label: Automatic turning on IR external relay output after set time
Value.Help: 0 - Auto ON disabled. 1 second to 32535 seconds Auto ON enabled with defined time, step is 1 second. Default value 0.

Value.label: Automatic turning off External relay output after set time
Value.Help: 0 - Auto OFF disabled. 1 second to 32536 seconds Auto OFF enabled with defined time, step is 1 second. Default value 0.

Value.label: Automatic turning on External relay output after set time
Value.Help: 0 - Auto ON disabled. 1 second to 32535 seconds Auto ON enabled with defined time, step is 1 second. Default value 0.

Value.label: Power reporting in Watts on power change
Value.Help: Set value from 0 - 100 (0% - 100%). 0 - Reporting Disabled. 1 - 100 = 1% - 100% Reporting enabled. Power report is send (push) only when actual power in Watts in real time change for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%. Default value 10.

Value.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval
Value.Help: Set value means time interval (0 - 32767) in seconds, when power report is send. 0 - Reporting Disabled. 1 second to 32767 seconds reporting enabled. Power report is send with time interval set by entered value. Default value 0.

Value.label: Enable /Disable endpoints IR external relay and External relay
Value.Help: Enabling IR external relay and External relay or both of them, means that endpoint (IR external relay) and endpoint (External relay) or both will be prensent on UI. Disabling them will result in hiding endpoints according to parameter set value.Note that hiding endpoint has no impact on its functionality. Default value 0
